name: Far from Home
description:
Ah, home. the place where you can let your worries rest and build your
weapons of mass destruction in peace and quiet.

Help Deidre upgrade her weapons using the wild natural resources
outside and get rid of the four dreaded Icefires roaming the forest
as well as their pesky minions.

Heed this warning:

When Deidre gets back home her wounds close and she can catch her breath but, on the other hand, the hoards of monsters outside increase in number.

WASD + Space

Mouse for aiming the slingshot (as well as bashing without space bar)
